qlabel: 1 MINE_CHECK_1 - In the last working week, where did you work?

categories.catLabel: MINE_1D In open pits or quarries
MINE_1F In the passageways used to transport the ore to the surface

qlabel: 2 MINE_CHECK_2 - What was mined or quarried where you worked? [INTERVIEWER: Please ask as an open ended question and code the response into the categories below.]

categories.catLabel: MINE_2A Clay or stone or gravel
MINE_2I Lime, lime stone or marble
MINE_2M Precious metals i.e., titanium, vanadium, platinum

qlabel: 3 MINE_RADIO_3 - In the last working week, what type of mine or quarry did you work in?
3A1 MINE_CHECK_3A1 - How was the area where you worked ventilated?

categories.catLabel: MINE_3A1A By local exhaust ventilation which captured the dust at the emission point
MINE_3A1B By on-tool extraction to remove dust away from your face
MINE_3A1C By a general ventilation system
MINE_3A1D By fans in the window or doorway
MINE_3A1E By open doors or windows
MINE_3A1F No ventilation was applied to the area

qlabel: 3A1G1 MINE_RADIO_3A1G1 - Please specify
4 MINE_RADIO_4 - In the last working week, did the mine or quarry you worked in have a crusher?

categories.catLabel: MINE_4A1A1B Using a brush or sweeping the area with a broom
MINE_4A1A1D The working area was not cleaned of dust

categories.catLabel: aDVM_1A1C Liquified Petroleum Gas (LPG) or propane

categories.catLabel: aDVM_1A3A1A Any public street or road in an urban area
aDVM_1A3A1B National, regional, district or municipal roads outside an urban area (including motorways)
aDVM_1A3A1F Surface driving in an open mine or in a quarry

categories.catLabel: aUVR_1A3A Under partial shade (e.g., sun shade sail, under trees)
